Author: hollyxdear
Text: Hey there. I totally get it I have been in a relapse for the last month after being dumped. It does feel like an old friend coming to visit and I don’t want them to leave. I had gained 40lbs in recovery and now I’m just fully focused on embracing the ed again.

Author: tylloh
Text: If he supposedly loves you and has feelings for you, why is he calling you fat? I think someone who really loved you wouldn’t treat you that way. That guy is being an ass so ignore the rude things he says and focus on the people who treat you with the love and respect you deserve, like it sounds like your boyfriend does!
